humanum_full_description_en:
hieroglyph, like the shape of a cave. The original meaning is a dwelling cave. "Shuowen": "Acupoint, earth room. Congluo, eight tones." At present, there is no separate " acupoint " in Oracle and Bronze inscriptions. " Acupoints " in bronze inscriptions are used as radicals, and the fonts are referred to as " empty " and "çª". "Shuowen" believes that the " acupoint " from the sound of "å…«" is based on a misanalysis of the later glyphs, and the glyph of the early " acupoints " is not from "å…«". (Refer to Ji Xusheng)

Early humans lived in earthen chambers. "Zhou Yi. The next part of the series: "Ancient cave dwelled in a wild place, and later saints changed their way to the palace." "Poetry. What is King Wen? "Mian": "Ancient father and father, Tao Fu Tao acupoint, no family." Zheng Xuanjian: "Cut the ground to call a cave." Yu Shengwu believes that " tao " is used as a verb here, referring to burning the bottom and wall of the cave . The inside of the cave is made of red burnt clay, which is strong in texture and moisture-proof. In the Chu script, there is a glyph from " acupoint " to " tu ", which is a variant of " acupoint ". (Li Shoukui, Qu Bing, Sun Weilong)

" Acupoint " can mean a tomb after death, such as "Poem. Wang Feng. Cart": "The valley is in a different room, and death is in the same cave." Zheng Xuanjian: "The cave is called the burrow." It also means the animal's nest. "Shan Hai Jing. Zhongshan Classics: "There are caves in Yan, bear caves, and people will always be out of God." "Huainanzi. "Qi Su": "Husbands and birds dominate the nest, foxes dominate the nest, the nester builds the nest and gets the habitation, and the burrower builds the nest and gets the residence."

" Acupoint " means not only a large cave, but also a small hole. "Shuowen" paragraph note: "All voids of extension are points." "Jade Chapter. "Acupoints": "Acupoints, holes are also." Such as "Mencius. "Teng Wen Gong 2": "If you don't wait for your parents' orders or the words of a matchmaker, you can drill a hole to see each other, if you go beyond the wall and follow each other, the parents and people will be cheap." "Acupuncture" means small holes and gaps.

" Acupoints " also mean the acupoints of the human body. "Su Wen. "Acupoint Theory" "Four Points of Yin and Yang", Zhang Zhicong's collection of annotations: "The person who covers the acupoint, the pulse and qi are also noted." "Treatise on Febrile Diseases. Cases of Typhoid Fever: "If you treat febrile disease, you can puncture fifty-nine points." On Qi Cave": "Yu Wen Qi Cave is three hundred and sixty-five, in order to be one year old."
